reviewtext: This is the broadband router that started the revolution. Linksys keeps updating the firmware to keep up with the new technology, but they basically did it right the first time in this area, and they continue to dominate.The router is very easy to set-up, but if you do have problems, or just want to learn more about it, there are plenty of people in newsgroups and web forums that have this very same router. You're bound to get any question you have answered quickly.
